title: Best of The Program | Guests: Sean Davis & Jason Whitlock | 11/18/20
description:
The Federalist co-founder Sean Davis joins to discuss the slimming chances that anything will come out of John Durham’s investigation into the Russia probe, despite massive evidence that something should. Congresswoman-elect Nicole Malliotakis talks the red wave of women entering Congress to fight against socialism. Outkick writer Jason Whitlock warns of a trend in black churches toward Marxism and black pride as the Left ramps up its focus on skin color.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

content:encoded:
The Federalist co-founder Sean Davis joins to discuss the slimming chances that anything will come out of John Durham’s investigation into the Russia probe, despite massive evidence that something should. Congresswoman-elect Nicole Malliotakis talks the red wave of women entering Congress to fight against socialism. Outkick writer Jason Whitlock warns of a trend in black churches toward Marxism and black pride as the Left ramps up its focus on skin color.
